org_name: CHARITY CULTURAL SERVICES CENTER CITYBUILD ACADEMY
description: Charity Cultural Services Center (CCSC) offers a variety of vocational training programs. The goal of the CityBuild program is to provide San Francisco residents the opportunity to receive vocational training and enter the union trades post graduation from the 18 week curriculum
notes: Appointments are preferred but drop-ins will be seen. Clients who are interested in a career in construction must be SF residents

keys: Assistance Getting Driver’s License and Other ID
Referrals to other resources available as needed
All individuals, ages 18 and older (171/2 ok with written permission from parents). To enter CityBuild all clients must have a valid CDL and a high school diploma/GED.
